name: @tsdotnet/tween-factory
description: A strongly-typed "tweening" utility for use with TypeScript and JavaScript.
author: electricessence

scripts.build:dist: rimraf dist/* && tsc && copyfiles -u 1 src/**/*.d.ts dist
scripts.bump: npm run precommit && npm version patch
scripts.bump-minor: npm run precommit && npm version minor
scripts.bump-MAJOR: npm run precommit && npm version major
scripts.docs: rimraf docs/* && rimraf docs/.nojekyll && typedoc --options typedoc.json --readme none
scripts.precommit: pnpm i && run-p lint test && run-p build:* && npm run validate && git status -s
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run build && run-p validate test
scripts.postversion: git push && git push --tags && npm run docs && git commit -m "Updated docs." docs && git push
